transcript: if we just do the basics always we are Advanced you have an incredibly proficient sales organization if you call all your leads within 5 minutes if you follow up two to three times a day for the first 5 days and if you follow up thereafter on an ongoing basis just providing value making sure that you actually follow the scripts on every call like the reason the script is there is because it's the most efficient version of the conversation it's just committing to those Basics but a lot of people get fancy because they think they're like special snowflakes and that for some reason when they they talk to prospects it's their magic you know voice that somehow is going to win them over but just just clear communication and and sticking to a calendar and a Cadence does wonders
